newsitem.title: MACEDONIA: NATIONAL BANK OF MACEDONIA FIX FOR MONDAY.
newsitem.headline: NATIONAL BANK OF MACEDONIA FIX FOR MONDAY.

text.p: The NBM calculates the denar's rate against the German mark
on the basis of the information submitted by banks during the
morning. Denar rates against other currencies are worked out
from the Frankfurt fixing rates, issued around 1500 local time.
